title: 服务器启动时后台显示一段重复的东西
author: 凉薄丶丶丶
txt_content:
1.14.3的服务器，只能装插件的，在启动时一直重复显示这段话

[18:33:29] [Server thread/提醒]:[DropItem] Task #16 for DropItem v7.2 generated an exception


java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/commons/lang3/tuple/Pair


at com.focess.dropitem.item.CraftAIListener$DropItemAI.run(CraftAIListener.java:46) ~[?:?]
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_14_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:81) ~[mcx.jar:git-
Spigot-4d2f30f-f1f3355]
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_14_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat


(CraftScheduler.java:394) [mcx.jar:git-Spigot-4d2f30f-f1f3355]
at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:1007) [mcx.jar:git-
Spigot-4d2f30f-f1f3355]
at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.DedicatedServer.b(DedicatedServer.java:396) [mcx.jar:git-Spigot-


4d2f30f-f1f3355]
at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:955) [mcx.jar:git-Spigot-
4d2f30f-f1f3355]
at net.minecraft.server.v1_14_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:800) [mcx.jar:git-
Spigot-4d2f30f-f1f3355]


at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_121]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
删除这个插件，可能不兼容 1.14.3 

DropItem

replies.author: 凉薄丶丶丶
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-8 18:43
删除这个插件，可能不兼容 1.14.3 

DropItem
我尝试一下

replies.txt_content:

删除这个插件，可能不兼容 1.14.3

ok啦！但是他现在一直显示Command Block chain tried to execute more than 0 steps!是什么鬼，虽然服务器已经可以进了
